issue.title: [C++] RecordBatch->Equals should also have a check_metadata argument
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7891](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7891). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Followup to ARROW-7720 and ARROW-7786. Table and Schema both have it, so it stands to reason that RecordBatch should too.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7891?focusedCommentId=17064924) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This is partially implemented in ARROW-7979. A follow up patch will be required to fully expose this in Python and R
